boardgame.name: Massive Darkness
boardgame.description: Massive Darkness brings the classic fantasy RPG experience to modern board gaming, with an action-packed campaign chock full of gorgeous miniatures and a streamlined system that keeps the focus on the heroes' actions, with no need for a game master to control the enemies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Using the popular Zombicide system as a starting point, Massive Darkness adds all the richness of a dungeon crawl RPG. Pick your hero, choose a class, decide on which skills to spend your XP, and get loot by searching the dungeon or killing special enemies that can use the equipment against you! Face a multitude of different enemy types, coming in all shapes and sizes, whose behavior is resolved automatically...or you can try to sneak around enemies by taking advantage of dark areas of the map._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players begin their adventure in Massive Darkness by picking a Hero _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; each with two special starting skills _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and pair them with a Class of their choosing. Depending on the combination, another skill can be unlocked, giving players a wide range of choices and play styles. In Massive Darkness, the created Heroes go on Quests, killing monsters, collecting loot, and gaining XP. Players spend their XP to unlock new Skills, growing more powerful as the Quest progresses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Throughout the game, players encounter different monsters, including Minions, Agents, Roaming Monsters, and Bosses. An unique mechanism of the game is the Guardian. Any of the monster types have a chance of spawning as a Guardian, meaning it will use a random piece of equipment in the fight against Heroes. However, if players are able to overcome this difficult encounter, they will acquire that piece of loot!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

This is for the Massive Darkness _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Zombicide Black Plague crossover set. Paypal or bank transfer. Shipping as letter without tracking (1.45€ to germany or 3.70€ to rest of EU). The Crossover Set comes with 15 Hero Cards to bring the main Black Plague Survivors as Heroes in Massive Darkness. 6 Heroes from the Black Plague core box 4 Heroes from the Wulfsburg expansion 5 Heroes from the Hero Box-1 expansion The Crossover Set includes 19 Guard cards to bring many Zombies as Mobs and Agents: Walkers from the Black Plague core box are a Mob, with a Fatty as the Boss. Runners from the Black Plague core box are a Mob, with the Abomination as the Boss. Necromancer from the Black Plague core box is an Agent. Wolfz from the Wulfsburg expansion are a Mob, with the Wolfbomination as the Boss. Deadeye Walkers are a Mob, using one sculpt as the Minions, and another as the Boss. There are also 6 Roaming Monster cards to use the Abominations from the Zombie Bosses Abomination Pack: Abominatroll Ablobination Abominotaur Finally, the Crossover Set will allow you to bring ALL the Massive Darkness Heroes to Black Plague as Survivors. 6 Survivors from the Massive Darkness core box 5 Survivors from unlocked Stretch Goals ANY other characters revealed during the KS campaign!

This is a complete all-in Kickstarted Edition of Massive Darkness. ACHTUNG: this set will only be *sold as a whole*. i *will not* separate individual pieces for sale, and questions/requests to that effect *will be politely ignored*. Differences from a brand-new set: - It has been opened and played about half a dozen times, but: -- All cards, except for the (unused) Zombie Black Plague crossover bits, have been sleeved from the moment they left their boxes, and are therefore in pristine condition. Sleeves are included in the sale. -- All boxes, books, and tiles are in like-new condition. -- None of the minis are painted, but all of the minis except for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;common mobs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; are labeled on their undersides. -- About a dozen of the character record sheets have been laminated or sleeved, but the rest are unused. -- The edges of many of the tokens have been colored over with a marker to improve their appearance (see the photo album). This bundle includes: - The core game. - All stretch goals, exclusives, and add-ons from the KS campaign: -- One set of each of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;frost_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;marble_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; dice sets (and the pretty black dice bag) -- The plastic token set -- The 3D Chests+Pillars and Doors+Bridges packs -- An extra set of tiles (unopened) for both the core game and Crystal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Lava campaign -- Reptisaurians -- Troglodytes -- Ratlings -- Elementals -- Sorcerers vs. Lord Tusk -- Warrior Priests vs. The Spearmaiden Cyclops -- Bloodmoon Assassins vs. The Hellephant -- Noble Warriors vs. The Cockatrix -- The Zombicide Black Plague crossover cards. -- The reprinted/errata_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d character and monster cards. All of the boxes include the original plastic blister packaging, but the minis are not stored in them. It also includes the following _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;extras_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;: - ALL of the cards, except for the (unused) ZBP crossover bits, are sleeved using docsmagic.de-brand thin sleeves. - Three plastic organizer boxes (approx. 25 Euro value): a small one holding the tokens and two large ones holding all of the minis except for the Cyclops and Reptisaurus (neither of which fit in any reasonably-sized organizer box and both of which are stored in their respective expansion_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s box). - Sleeves for the character record sheets. They fit the sheets perfectly if one trims about 2mm from the top and bottom edges of the sheets (this does not trim any of the text, just the extraneous border) SHIPPING NOTES: - The package ships from southern Germany and weighs approximately 12.5kg, so postage costs will be appropriately high: -- 16.50 Euros if shipped within Germany -- 34(!) to all EU countries outside of Germany -- Source: https://www.dhl.de/de/privatkunden/preise/preise-international.html - If you come by and pick up the set, i will reduce the price by 30 Euros (plus you save on shipping). Reason for selling: i_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m simply not feeling it. This game was marketed as the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;next evolutionary step_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in Zombicide, yet the only thing it has in common with Zombicide is the size of the components (minis and board tiles). Feel free to contact me (in English or German) with any questions *EXCEPT for the following*: 1) As mentioned above, i will *ignore* any requests to separate and sell individual components. This set will be sold only as a whole. NO EXCEPTIONS. 2) The listed price is non-negotiable (unless, of course, you want to negotiate upwards!). Part of that price accounts for me having to hand-carry the Massive Package 2km to the nearest post office to ship it.
